top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
Great advice, also works without charging the phone
Don’t take this advice if you sleep through alarms. My roommate has been doing this and I’ve turned off 6 alarms this morning after they played for 5 minutes
There should be some app to prevent us of using phones after some time . But thats already behaviour of addict, if someone else has to deprive us of a phone haha
Getting in the habit of (over) charging your phone while you sleep may have the added benefit of fucking up your battery.
